ygData.subject: Dieing.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I hardly ever die.  Im not being cocky, Im just a very cautious player. When I solo, I cut and run if it looks iffy, and I try to only group with people
ygData.messageBody:
>You know reading John's post I realized its been a while since I died 4
>times in an outdoor zone run in a while, but the last time it happened was
>hilarious.

I hardly ever die. Im not being cocky, Im just a very cautious player.
When I solo, I cut and run if it looks iffy, and I try to only group with
people who have a clue about really grouping (i.e. one person pull, you all
wait here, no idiots going to sell when a pull is occurring, etc.). But
last night, I felt like a horses ass..

I had been playing in N. Ro. Was in a group, foolishly one that did not
hold to my group ideals, but even more foolish was I for not disbanding.
Like I said, I dont die much.. on this occasion I did, and guess where I
re-popped....

..
....
.....Quenos! ARRRGH! To say I felt like a dumb shit, was an
understatement, I had never got rebound in freeport, what was I thinking?
Luckily a LVL 40 Wizzie was in the zone, and after a little begging gladly
took me back to N. Ro. At which point I got my corpse and got bound.
